text: The Kokate Koli, or Kokata Koli is a clan of Koli caste found in the Indian state of Maharashtra. in 1776, Kokata Kolis revolted against Peshwa government in Maratha Empire. == History == The Kokote Kolis served in Maratha Empire as Subedar and Faujdar. The Koli subedar burnt down the rebellion of Gavlis against Peshwa. == Related pages == * Javji Bamble == References == == Other websites == * Gazetteer of Bombay Presidency: Ahmadnagar Category:Koli clans
title: Kokate Kolis
